question: Which of the following about S.H.M is correct?
option1: In S.H.M. acceleration is maximum at extreme position
option2: In S.H.M. velocity is minimum at extreme position
explanation: In S.H.M: 1. acceleration is maximum at extreme position. 2. velocity is minimum at extreme position. 3. Direction of velocity is either towards or away from mean position depending on the position of particle.
